dcterms:description: The MDC dataset records comprehensive smartphone usages with fine granularity of time, collected from nearly 200 participants over more than 18 months, allowing for the investigation of individual mobility patterns.
dcterms:title: Mobile Data Challenge (MDC) dataset

dcterms:creator: J. K. Laurila

dcterms:description: The Mobile Data Challenge provides a large dataset for mobile computing research, focusing on the analysis of mobility patterns and behaviors from smartphone data.
dcterms:title: Mobile Data Challenge (MDC) dataset
